effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Rising Sun Kick and Spinning Crane Kick by 3% stacking up to 10 times. Rising Sun Kick and Spinning Crane Kick have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Fists of Fury applies 1 stack of  Winning Streak! when cast and when finished channeling completely. The damage of your next Fists of Fury is increased by 8% per stack when  Winning Streak! is removed.

Your  Winning Streak! is always removed once it reaches max stacks.

sockets.display_string: +136 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Conductor's Wax Whistle

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a chance to direct a Kobold Cart towards your target, sending a careening troop that collides with enemies, inflicting 687,384 Physical damage split between enemies impacted.

description: A hero's symbolic trophy, for the kobolds need not be summoned. The kobolds yearn for the catacombs.

name: Turbo-Drain 5000

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful spells and abilities have a chance to drain your target's electrical power, dealing 297,757 Nature damage over 5 sec. If the target dies while being drained, you gain 25% movement speed for 5 sec.

description: The 8th Rule of Commerce: Fast goblins are smart goblins!

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

Equip: Gain a high chance to follow up your attacks with a fiery gilded uppercut, dealing 411,703 Fire damage to your target. Molten gold continues to splatter to deal 114,363 Fire damage over 5 sec to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 enemies.
